unsubscribe_description1_text: We understand that you would like to unsubscribe from your subscription with Cogoport.
unsubscribe_description2_text: We are sorry to hear that you no longer wish to continue your subscription with us.
see_message: Its sad to see you go....
tricket_message: Please note it down to contact us for further details. Reach out to us at
tell_us_description1_text: Please note that your request for unsubscribing will be processed with in the next 48 hours. During this time, a member of our team will reach out to you via the contact information you provided to confirm your decision and gather any additional information if necessary.
tell_us_description2_text: This step allows us to ensure that your unsubscribe request is accurately processed and to better understand your preferences.
unsubscribe_error_message: *please give us a reason to unsubscribe
